title: Jeffrey Epstein scouted women for New York Giants co-owner Steve Tisch, emails show
desc: The emails, sent in 2013, were among more than 3 million Epstein-related documents the Department of Justice released Friday.

title: Texas May Be Losing Its Grip as America’s Fastest-Growing State
desc: Long accustomed to rapid growth, Texas saw the overall number of people moving from other states sink to its lowest level in two decades, census estimates show.

title: Pupil stabbed at Merseyside school as boy, 13, arrested
desc: The injured boy was taken to hospital following the incident

title: Under Salt Marsh review - Rafe Spall’s thrilling Welsh crime drama is clever, gripping TV
desc: This carefully plotted tale of the investigation into a small boy’s death is a compelling, psychologically astute watch – which constantly pulls the rug out from under you

title: Sony Pictures Classics Lands 'Bedford Park' After Winning Sundance Prize
desc: Sony Pictures Classics lands rights to Stephanie Ahn's feature debut "Bedford Park," winner of the Sundance special jury award for debut feature.

title: Munster rally but can't avoid defeat in Glasgow
desc: Munster's second-half rally was not enough to reel in Glasgow Warriors who cemented their position at the top of the United Rugby Championship with a 31-22 victory at Scotstoun.

title: Study: Social isolation, digital exclusion significantly heightens older adults’ risk of depression
desc: Older adults who are socially isolated and digitally excluded experienced a 60% higher risk of depression, according to a January study published in Medicine. Additionally, physical function outcomes were consistently worse among this group.

title: Wantage man, 39, arrested after woman is 'raped' at night
desc: A man has been arrested after a woman was raped late at night in Wantage.

title: A pregnant pause to changes in abnormal breast cells tied to cancer risk
desc: New study by UC Santa Cruz team discovers that early pregnancy in mice reduces buildup of ‘confused’ cells that could lead to breast cancer later in life

title: FPL Gameweek 24 Scout Picks: Three double
desc: In the Scout Picks, we choose the best Fantasy Premier League (FPL) players for Gameweek 24 ahead of Saturday’s deadline.
